comments:

In PDE perspective with plugins projects with break points.
launch debuger with a runtime workbench.
Processor usage jumps to 100%.
killall java doesnot return processor usage to normal.
using RHEL3u3 (gnome 2.2.2, gtk 1.2.10)

eclipse.buildId=M200410121820
java.version=1.4.2_06
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=linux, ARCH=x86, WS=gtk, NL=en_IE

SWT requires at least GTK 2.06 (see SWT FAQ - http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/~checkout~/
platform-swt-home/faq.html#gtkstartup)

Marking as wontfix as required version of GTK is not being used. Also suggest 
to try this using a recent 3.1 build, such as 3.1RC1 or RC2 that comes out 
this week.
